/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -Wextra -Wformat-security -Wvla -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-unused-parameter -O2 -fabi-version=2 -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fno-strict-aliasing -DDBUG_OFF    CMakeFiles/mysqldump.dir/mysqldump.c.o CMakeFiles/mysqldump.dir/__/sql-common/my_user.c.o  -o CMakeFiles/CMakeRelink.dir/mysqldump  -lpthread ../libmysql/libperconaserverclient.a -lpthread -lm -lrt -ldl
